Name: First-in-human evaluation of [11C]MH1, a novel PET radioligand to quantify cyclooxygenase-2
HowToAcknowledge: This workflow uses FreeSurfer: `Fischl, B., FreeSurfer. Neuroimage, 2012. 62(2): p. 774-8.`,and the MiDeFace package developed by Doug Greve: `https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/MiDeFace`
